channel.title: About on LGM
channel.description: Recent content in About on LGM

item.title: csmertx
item.description: LGM (Linux Gremlin Mysteries) A pet project website Recommended Linux Websites Some have YouTube channels Learn Linux TV Linuxize AskUbuntu Tecmint ItsFOSS nixCraft Linux Mint Forums Ubuntu: The Linux command line for beginners Techspot: A Beginner’s Guide to the Linux Command Line Recommended Linux Podcast networks All have YouTube channels (50K+ subscribers) Tux Digital (Destination Linux) Jupiter Broadcasting Gremlins? grem·lin ˈgrem-lən A cause of error or equipment malfunction (as in aircraft) conceived of as a small mischievous gnome
